description: Scientists have long speculated about the possibility of life on Mars owing to the planet's proximity and similarity to Earth. Although fictional Martians have been a recurring feature of popular entertainment, it remains an open question whether life currently exists on Mars, or has existed there in the past. The curiosity we have for this strange extraterrestrial world has led us to explore it further with missions that include: Mariner 4, Viking orbiters, Viking experiments, and the Phoenix Lander. To find out more about future missions, meteorites, possible underground water and other scientific discoveries and theories download the Life on Mars ebook today!
